snippet: Harbinger Capital Partners, the hedge fund run by Philip A. Falcone, lost 46.6 percent in 2011, as its biggest investment took a beating, according to some investors.
abstract: Harbinger Capital Partners, the hedge fund run by Philip A. Falcone, lost 46.6 percent in 2011, as its biggest investment took a beating, according to some investors.

headline.seo: Hedge Fund Is Said to Have Lost 46% of Its Value
